titles: The mad dialogue sung by Mr. Leveridge and Mrs. Lynsey ; sett by Mr. Purcell.
author: Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695.
D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723. Richmond heiress.
Leveridge, Richard, 1670 or 71-1758.
Lindsey, Mrs. (Mary), fl. 1697-1715?
notes: The dialogue song (Z. 608/1a-n) sung in T. D'Urfey's play 'The Richmond heiress'.
For two voices and continuo (figured bass).
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: 2000 microform ed. lacks all after first leaf.
First line: Behold, behold the man that with gigantick might.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
